name: Cop Chase Shooting & Racing
description:
'Cop Chase Shooting & Racing' is an intense action racing game which pits your driving skills against cops desperate to takedown in wild chase. Crash and bash through smash-able scenery in Muscle Car, Helicopter, Power Boat and takedown Cop's by launching rockets, dropping mines, leaking oil, placing spikes on the way…etc.


*****Features*****
*****Stunning 3D graphics.
*****Cool sound effects.
*****Large, beautiful, scenes to drive through.
***** Physics based chaos and mayhem.
*****Ground-breaking, easy to use driving controls.
